/usr/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++  -mcpu=cortex-m7 -mthumb -mfloat-abi=hard  -mfpu=fpv5-d16 -Os -Wall -fdata-sections -ffunction-sections -Wattributes -Wdouble-promotion -Wno-unused-variable -Wno-write-strings -fpermissive  -specs=nosys.specs -Wl,--gc-sections -specs=nano.specs -T /mnt/c/Users/jon/Documents/GitHub/32blit-beta/32blit-stm32/STM32H750VBTx_FLASH.ld  -Wl,-Map=tilt.map,--cref   -o tilt.elf 32blit/libBlitEngine.a
